tha-ap44:11.4: kusalabbhave → kusale bhave (bj, s2, s3, pts1)
tha-ap44:18.2: pavarā ca sā → pavarāvayā (s2, s3) | pavarā mayā (pts1) | pavarā piyā (?)
tha-ap44:22.2: parikkhatā → purakkhatā (si, s2, s3, pts1, mr)
tha-ap44:33.1: āyasmā soṇo koḷiviso → soṇo koṭikaṇṇo (bj, mr) | soṇo koṭiyavesso (s2, s3) | soṇo koḷiyavesso (pts1)
